Headline: No trains between Forest Park and UIC-Halsted
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Forest Park and UIC-Halsted due to a minor fire at track level at Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Forest Park and UIC-Halsted due to a minor fire at track level at Cicero.

As a result, trains are operating only between Rosemont and UIC-Halsted at this time.

  Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service between Forest Park and UIC-Halsted.

 At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
